attributes.action: UK Parliament petitions should only be signed once by UK residents.
attributes.additional_details: Six million sign petition to revoke article 50, this along with other petitions have clearly been abused by those of who would like to dictate the path of our great nation.
attributes.background: We need to put a Stop on multy email an EU members from signing an interfering with our democracy. This site should be a clear unbiased idea of the British people's wishes.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take. The petitions system already has measures in place to prevent petitions being signed fraudulently.

At present British citizens can sign petitions if they live or are serving overseas. You could start a new petition to make it so that only people who live in the UK can sign petitions if that is something you would like to see happen.
